name: Caveman (itch) (Ehsanul Haque Mithun)
description:
Caveman is a 15 level side scrolling interesting game.

once upon a time there was a caveman, onced he had lost his cave destroying by a earthquake. so come out for searching a suitable cave, on the path of his searching he meet many more enemies, they were various kind of wild animals. At last he would find a suitable cave.

So friends, let's enjoy by playing this interesting game.
